dublinCore.title: Rainbow Color Picker
creator: Claude AI
Dan McCreary
subject: Computer Graphics
Color Theory
Digital Art
dublinCore.description: An interactive simulation displaying a horizontal rainbow band with a slider to select colors. Shows a color swatch and RGB values for the selected hue.

educational.topic: Color Models, RGB, HSB, Visible Spectrum
learningObjectives: Understand the visible light spectrum and its representation as a rainbow
Learn the relationship between HSB and RGB color models
Identify RGB values for primary and secondary colors
Explore how colors transition smoothly in digital representations

controls.name: colorSlider
controls.label: Color Selection
controls.description: Select a hue value from 0 to 360 degrees

assumptions: Full saturation and brightness for pure spectral colors
Linear mapping of hue to horizontal position
limitations: Does not show variations in saturation or brightness
Digital rainbow differs from natural continuous spectrum
